channel.title: Can't log on to my server after forwarding ports
channel.description:
I forward the ports and everything, then i go on to the server and on the command prompt of the server is says connection accepted from (censored) but on the actual client it says error connecting to server. And YES i went into the server notepad file and changed the ip... still not working. 317 server dlink dir-615
EDIT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! [url=http://s1092.photobucket.com/albums/i407/mikey3889/?action=view&current=Untitled.png]http://s1092.photobucket.com/albums/i407/mikey3889/?action=view&current=Untitled.png[/url] i used canyouseeme, and it cannot see my port. :( so that link is a picture of what my portforward looks like

item.title: Can't log on to my server after forwarding ports
item.dc:creator: @fleminmj01 fleminmj01
item.description:
@fleminmj01 wrote:

hi m8

i have exactly the same issue with the combattscape source… and dunnily enough i have the same router and same port forward. the second i portforwarded it just said error connecting to server. it all works fine on 127.0.0.1 but when i put it on my no-ip in gui is just fucks me off lol… any ideas???

Read full topic
item.source: Can't log on to my server after forwarding ports

item.title: Can't log on to my server after forwarding ports
item.dc:creator: @mikey3889 mikey3889
item.description:
@mikey3889 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:5, topic:401046”][quote author=mikey3889 link=topic=498101.msg3642502#msg3642502 date=1309117128]

Go to: www.canyouseeme.org
Then come back and tell us.

i used canyouseeme with the server running and it detected service, it said my isp is NOT blocking port 43594.
Yet when i go and try and run it on the client it says error connecting to server, however on the server it says that it recieved a connection when i attempted to log on
[/quote]
Don’t get me wrong, I’m not a professional with all this server stuff since I never went into depth with it. However, I will do the best I can with assisting you.

OT: Do please try another source see if it works, are you trying to connect to code for yourself at the moment, or letting others play?[/quote]

I’m running the darknesscape source, i need to let others play to get my friends to join, i did not code this in any way. theoke did, i will try another source now

Read full topic
item.source: Can't log on to my server after forwarding ports

item.title: Can't log on to my server after forwarding ports
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“mikey3889, post:4, topic:401046”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=498101.msg3642461#msg3642461 date=1309114955]
Go to: www.canyouseeme.org
Then come back and tell us.
[/quote]

i used canyouseeme with the server running and it detected service, it said my isp is NOT blocking port 43594.
Yet when i go and try and run it on the client it says error connecting to server, however on the server it says that it recieved a connection when i attempted to log on[/quote]
Don’t get me wrong, I’m not a professional with all this server stuff since I never went into depth with it. However, I will do the best I can with assisting you.

OT: Do please try another source see if it works, are you trying to connect to code for yourself at the moment, or letting others play?

Read full topic
